name: G-ZERO GB
description:
G-ZERO is a simple racing game for the Gameboy. It has been created for the GBCOMPO21 and was inspired by a F-Zero pixelart demake from Miguel Sanchez. G-ZERO was made with GBDK2020 and is open source. The ROM is just 32k which makes it easy to use (no memory bank controller required).

Constrols:

  • D-Pad = Move
  • A = Accelerate
  • B = Break
  • Start = Start Game / Pause

Credits:

  • Artwork: Carlos Dattoli
  • Programming: User0x7f
  • Graphics: User0x7f
  • Sound effects: User0x7f
  • Music: Taken from the GB-Studio-Community-Assets project. Original music by Krümel but it has been modified by User0x7f.
